subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Danleigh Borman’s late goal helped the Red Bulls overcome the ejections of a teammate and their coach and earn a 1-1 tie with the visiting Kansas City Wizards on Saturday.
snippet: Danleigh Borman’s late goal helped the Red Bulls overcome the ejections of a teammate and their coach and earn a 1-1 tie with the visiting Kansas City Wizards on Saturday.
